content: pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only this is not a finished product the mint to v pullover is worked in one piece with a v_stitch lace pattern worked throughout piece is finished by seaming the sleeves and sides cuff and collar added after the piece is seamed the open stitch makes it the perfect transitional piece for spring and fall temperatures this soft and cozy design is made in knit picks mighty stitch worsted shown in a gorgeous shade of mint video tutorial included for size medium on youtube schematics and body measuring instructions included video link https //youtu be/u6mwb8yh0ri xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x finished bust inches 36 39 42 46 49 55 58 62 65 yarn requirements knit picks/wecrochet mighty stitch worsted- 20% superwash wool 80% acrylic 208 yds/100g shown in mint balls 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 8 9 yards 945 990 1090 1150 1250 1390 1490 1600 1645 purchase yarn here https //shrsl com/24tfx us i/9 5 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge us j/10 6mm or size needed to obtain gauge use code mjs15 for 15% off furls hooks - https //shrsl com/36nzt additional supplies yarn needle removable stitch markers blocking mat and pins steamer you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online i would love you to reference me as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items
